page.title: 06THE BAKERY BRANSCOMBE.
page.content: Mr Collier has been a baker for 70 years.He makes bread, scones, buns and cakes. The baker gets up at 4 o'clock. The baker wasn't the first one there his dad and his grandad was there.The baker gets the wood from local farms.The flour used to come from Mill Farm.The bakery started 120 years ago. It is the only one left England.He bakes 100 big loaves and 70 small ones.Its the only bakery he's worked in.The flour comes from Bristel.He sells 170 loaves in a day.He started when he was twelve.The bundles on 1 load.He puts 2 faggots in the oven and burns them until they are very hot.The bread goes in with the faggots.
